Class FindAndReplaceDialog.ReplaceDialog

java.lang.Object

java.awt.Container

java.awt.Dialog
javax.swing.JDialog
msnotepad.gui.helper.FindAndReplaceDialog.ReplaceDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Enclosing class:
FindAndReplaceDialog
private static class FindAndReplaceDialog.ReplaceDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
ReplaceDialog inner class handle the Replacing part of the Edit menu. It also use some method of the Find Dialog.
